description:
log/syslog: add Alert()

Alert logs a message using the LOG_ALERT priority.

messages.text:
Hello mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Please add "Fixes..." line to the body of description.

On 2011/12/21 16:34:52, vadik wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=17cf5cbe5465 ***

log/syslog: add Alert method

Alert logs a message using the LOG_ALERT priority.

Fixes issue 2325.

R=mikioh.mikioh, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5504058

Committer: Mikio Hara <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com>

LGTM

I looked in the man page and it appears that this is
the only case were missing, so fine.  If there were
going to be 10 more I would object.

Leaving for Mikio.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5504058/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go
File src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5504058/diff/4001/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#newcode108
src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go:108: // ERR logs a message using the LOG_ERR priority.
Please change this to Err while you are here.
Not sure why it says ERR.

LGTM

I'll submit with "Fixes issue 2325" line.

subject: code review 5504058: log/syslog: add Alert()
